dc_description_s: includes a decorative cartouche, decorative scale of miles, coat of arms and dedication to Guilielmo Backer de Corneliis by Joh. Blaeu.; French text on verso.; From: Appendice de la I & II partie du Theatre du monde ou Nouvel atlas ... Amsterdami : Apud G. et I. Blaue, 1638-1640.|40 x 52 centimeters, on sheet 51 x 60 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:15,000,000|General Map Collection
